BlackRoad OS Hub - CRM Dashboard

Your unified command center for Financial Advisor, General, and Agency CRM products

Financial Advisor CRM

Manage high-net-worth client households, financial accounts, and wealth planning.

  • Client Households - Track AUM, risk profiles, review schedules
  • Financial Accounts - Monitor portfolio positions by custodian
  • Liquidity Events - IPO, M&A, and business sale planning
  • Mortality Events - Estate processing workflows
  • Compliance Logs - FINRA audit trail

General CRM

Track leads, companies, deals, and sales pipeline.

  • Leads - Capture and qualify prospects
  • Companies - Manage business accounts
  • Deals - Track opportunities through pipeline
  • Activities - Log calls, emails, meetings
  • Tasks - Manage follow-ups and action items

Agency CRM

Manage agents, clients, policies, listings, and commissions.

  • Agents - Track agent performance and territories
  • Clients - Manage agency client relationships
  • Policies - Insurance and coverage tracking
  • Listings - Property and asset inventory
  • Commissions - Calculate and track payouts
